      • convertToObj

        public static Request convertToObj(java.lang.String json)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Function that converts a String parameter into a Request object
        Parameters:
        json - is the String of the request received from the client
        Returns:
        return an Request object with all the fields containning data from the json String

        java.io.IOException - from the convertion

      • convertToJson

        public static java.lang.String convertToJson(Answer answerObject,
                                             java.lang.String json)
                                      throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Function that converts a Answer object into a JSON String where all the data is written in conformity with JSON conventions
        Parameters:
        answerObject - is the object with all the data about the answer to retrieve to the client
        json - is the String that contains the request, only for logging purposes
        Returns:
        return a JSON String with all the data contained in the object
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - from the convertion
